description:
Welcome to Hex Crush - Hexagon Block Hexa Puzzle!
An engaging puzzle game Hex Crush, simple but distinctive.

Features of Hex Crush:
- Simple but Unique hex crush game
- Amazing Props you never seen
- Share to Facebook, leadboard to play with friends
- Fun, relax, and exciting game experiences
- both Classic Mode & Story Mode
- Various types of hundreds of levels and still keep updating
- Play the special levels to win Surprise Award! (Funny special levels/little games: Hit it, Gold Miner, Cute Crush, Fly Bird, Bear Jump, and Bubble!)

Free fun game for all ages, wow, my Hex Crush!

Hex Crush is a simple yet very addictive game for iPhones and iPads.

Drag the hex blocks from bubbles to the board, create and destroy full lines in any of the primary three directions.

Don't forget to use the props, the bomb will explode all the hexagons around it, the keys will open a hex cage at once, the hammer can destroy a hexagon once... and we also have magic wand, guess what its used for! Yes, it will change each of the 4 optional blocks into a single hexagon!

* Hex Crush Classic Mode
Endless classic mode, no time limit! Just enjoy a fun and relaxing hex puzzle time.

* Hex Crush Story Mode
Achieve the targets to win current level and unlock next level! Various types of hundreds of levels! Are you sure you can finish all of the hex levels?

Get combos bonus score by destroying multiple lines hexagons at the same time!

Let's Hex Crush!

Now you can play with Facebook friends,come on.
